title: Delete a Submodule
description: In Git, a submodule is a repository that is included in another repository as a subdirectory. Submodules allow you to keep a separate repository for a specific project within a larger project. However, there may be situations where you need to delete a submodule from your repository. In this challenge, you will learn how to delete a submodule from a Git repository.
